overview:
Syed Ahmed is an effective communicator with exceptional problem solving, Experience in Customer service, Logistics, Process Development & Re-engineering, Project management, Business Management Success in Software & BPO Operations in Management Positions.

He has Expertise in managing revenues – cost saving, and developing Business strategies/solutions.

He is also Technically sophisticated IT professional with key focus on achieving bottom–line results while formulating and implementing advanced technology and business solutions to meet a diversity of client needs.

Traveled extensively to deliver / attend training’s and conduct Business meetings in countries like: USA, The Netherlands, Singapore, Japan, Malaysia and China.

His Specialties include: Customer Relationships, Account Management, Resource Management, Cost Saving & Inventory usage Reduction, Team Training & Mentoring, Global Business Practices, Good balance of people & task orientation, Process Redesign/Streamlining
